Matt V has bought a CNC router (made by routoutuk). It has a bed size of 50cm2 with a Z axis travel of 8cm. It lives in G10 (across the corridor from our main space). He's happy to give CNC router training training and make it available for trained hackspace members.

Other people who are interested in CNC milling:

  • Lek and Row have a working CNC router.
  • David H is building a CNC router.
